  <description>
    <facet>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_107655</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_107655</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Gravitational pull on an orbiting spacecraft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gravitationszugkraft auf einem umkreisenden 
Raumfahrzeug</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Gravitation sur un vaisseau spatial orbital</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tração gravitacional em uma nave espacial 
orbiting</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attrazione gravitazionale su una nave spaziale 
orbiting</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βαρύτητας τράβηγμα σε ένα βάζοντας σε τροχιά 
διαστημικό σκάφος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gravitación en una nave espacial orbiting</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The figure shows the gravitational pull acting on a spacecraft moving in a circular orbit around the Earth. Spacecraft's path and velocity is also indicated.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circular orbit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravitational force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravitational pull</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">spacecraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">velocity</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Abbildung zeigt die Gravitationszugkraft, die
auf einem Raumfahrzeug fungiert, das in einer kreisförmigen Bahn um 
die Masse bewegt. Pfad und Geschwindigkeit des Raumfahrzeugs 
wird auch angezeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La figure montre la gravitation agissant sur un 
vaisseau spatial se déplaçant dans une orbite circulaire autour de 
la terre. La voie d'accès et la vitesse du vaisseau spatial est
également indiquée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A figura mostra a tração gravitacional que age 
em uma nave espacial que move-se em uma órbita circular em torno da 
terra. O trajeto e a velocidade da nave espacial são indicados 
também.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La figura mostra la attrazione gravitazionale che
si comporta su una nave spaziale che si muove in un'orbita circolare 
intorno alla terra. Il percorso e la velocità della nave 
spaziale egualmente è indicato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο αριθμός εμφανίζει βαρύτητας τράβηγμα ενεργώντας σε 
ένα διαστημικό σκάφος που κινείται σε μια κυκλική τροχιά γύρω 
από τη γη. Το μονοπάτι και η ταχύτητα του διαστημικού 
σκάφους είναι επίσης υποδειγμένα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La figura muestra la gravitación que actúa en 
una nave espacial que se mueve en una órbita circular alrededor de la
tierra. El camino y la velocidad de la nave espacial también se
indica.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kreisförmige Bahn</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gravitationskraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gravitationszugkraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwerkraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Raumfahrzeug</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
